Text.Page:
It's not just the faeries causing problems. The forest's ordinary predators are getting more aggressive.

The {@LinkCreature:2#4#slinking sabertooths}, for example, usually eat warthogs and piglings.

But now they've added "loggers" to their diet. I'm putting a bounty on them. Bring back their teeth for a reward.
Here's the bounty for the teeth, just as I promised.
You can't pull a tooth from a sabertooth? It's the biggest thing they've got!
